sentences.en: It is important to remember that kinetic energy is not conserved in the collision.
sentences.cn: 必须记住,在碰撞中动能不守恒.

sentences.en: It is necessary to explicitly introduce chemical kinetic limitations into the envelope flame model.
sentences.cn: 显然必须把化学动力学限制引入外边层火焰模型.

sentences.en: It might seem surprising that any mathematical derivation based on the kinetic theory could be simple.
sentences.cn: 令人惊奇的是,基于分子运动论的数学推导都是简单的.

sentences.en: Kinetic energy is a scalar property of motion.
sentences.cn: 动能是运动的一种标量属性.

sentences.en: Penetration in matter depends on the kinetic energy of the electrons, E.
sentences.cn: 在物质中的贯穿能力,都是和电子的动能E有关的.

sentences.en: Potential energy is convertible to kinetic energy.
The energy for this motion is obtained at the expense of their kinetic energy.
sentences.cn: 这个运动的能量是通过消耗其动能取得的.

sentences.en: The familiar form of the kinetic energy will not do.
sentences.cn: 通常形式的动能将不适用.

sentences.en: The fundamental pharmacokinetic principles are based upon the most elementary kinetic model.
sentences.cn: 药动学的基本原理是以最基本的动力学模型为依据.

sentences.en: The kinetic theory of gases is the best known example.
sentences.cn: 气体动力学理论就是最有名的例子.

sentences.en: The kinetic theory was rediscovered and refined.
sentences.cn: 分子运动论被重新发现并得到进一步的提炼.

sentences.en: The nonrelativistic formula underestimates the kinetic energy.
sentences.cn: 非相对论公式对动能的估算偏低.

sentences.en: The relativistic kinetic energy diverges completely from the Newtonian formula.
sentences.cn: 相对论动能完全偏离了牛顿力学的公式.

sentences.en: There exist many sources of energy both potential and kinetic.
sentences.cn: 存在着许多势能和动能的能源.

sentences.en: These components are known as the zonal kinetic energy and eddy kinetic energy respectively.
sentences.cn: 这两部分能量分别称作纬向动能和涡旋动能.

words.tran_cn: 动觉的（等于kinaesthetic）；肌肉运动知觉的
运动机能学；人体运动学
运动觉，动觉；肌肉运动知觉

trans.tran_cn: 运动的，活跃的，能动的，有力的，[物]动力（学）的，运动的
